# Test

```{r setup, message = F, warning = F, results = 'hide', echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = F, message = F, echo = F, fig.path = 'figs/', fig.path = 'figures/')

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(crosstalk)

data(npsmosdat)

dat <- npsmosdat %>% 
  filter(bay_segment == 'Old Tampa Bay') %>% 
  group_by(date, lu) %>% 
  summarise(tn_load = sum(tn_load, na.rm = T), .groups = 'drop')
```

```{r, out.width = '100%'}
toplo <- highlight_key(dat)
filter_select("lutyp", "Land use type", toplo, ~lu, multiple = F)
plot_ly(toplo)  %>% 
  add_trace(x = ~date, y = ~tn_load, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', line = list(color = 'rgba(49,130,189, 1)', width = 2))
```
